headline: Is Kimberly-Clark (KMB) Now Attractive After A 20% Share Price Slide?
summary: If you are wondering whether Kimberly-Clark is starting to look like value at around US$98.07 per share, you are not alone. The stock is down 3.4% over the last week, 4.7% over the last month, and 19.8% over the past year, which has shifted how some investors think about both its return potential and its risk profile. Recent attention on consumer staples and household products companies has put Kimberly-Clark back on watchlists, as investors reassess how more defensive names fit into their...
